page.title: 12PETERSFIELD INFANT SCHOOL
page.content: Some builders have been building a new school for Petersfield Infants just next to the old one. It is due to be finished on l6th August, 1985. There are going to be three classrooms upstairs and three downstairs. My Mum, who teaches there, is going to have a downstairs classroom. At first this was an all-age school and later a Primary school. Since 1975 when Herne Junior school was opened it has been an Infant school. There are 280 children on roll. The villages of Sheet, Steep and Stroud each have their own Primary schools. Children from all these schools go on to Petersfield Comprehensive School when they are 11.
